Title: Controls and Automation Engineer
Job_Description:
Do you enjoy being part of a successful team?

Would you enjoy testing innovative software for energy products?

Join our Bently Nevada Engineering team!

Bently Nevada, a Baker Hughes business, is an industry leader in condition monitoring and machine asset protection. Join our team of professional engineers specializing in plantwide, holistic suite of machine condition monitoring and protection hardware, software, and services that help our customers achieve the highest level of asset reliability possible. With over 60 years of experience and truly global support, our business supports many industries including renewable power generation through wind and hydro turbine monitoring solutions.

Title: Sr. Product Designer - Remote or Houston, TX
Job_Description:
Sr Product Designer (remote)

Are you excited about digital and the opportunity to help transform one of the most essential industries?

Join our Team!

A Senior Product Designer on our digital team within Baker Hughes has ownership over mission-critical design projects with high visibility and major impact. We provide you with the support and tools you need to succeed in an incubator-like environment to help you realize your design visons and take your skills to the next level. You’ll be a vital part of our digital transformation efforts, bringing fresh perspectives and a natural curiosity to everything we do. This position requires previous experience in both interaction design and visual design. The ideal candidate can take a project from discovery to polished designs, ensuring that our products meet high standards of usability and design.

Partner with the best

As a Senior Product Designer, you will be creating web/mobile applications for industrial internet of things. This is no sleepy corporate design gig! You’ll have the opportunity to lead multiple user experience engagements and craft consumer-grade experiences using Figma. We’re looking for ambitious designers who can take complete ownership of entire design projects and manage them end to end. You’ll also be learning from other designers at the top of their game!

Think of all the fun you’ll have…

Taking a project through all design phases, from discovery to polished visuals.

Collaborating with interaction designers and user interface developers to design the visual aspects of product user interfaces.

Partnering with product owners, architects, data scientists, and engineers to build user experiences from conception to launch.

Taking broad, conceptual ideas and quickly prototyping, testing and iterating into engaging experiences.

Understanding and interpreting brand, user, and business needs, in order to develop innovative, creative, and results-oriented digital solutions.

Discussing the future direction of design and user experience for the industrial internet of things.

Participating in team discussions about current user experience design projects.

Conducting research and evaluate emerging design, technology, industry, and market trends. Staying up-to-date on the latest design trends, digital platforms and competitive landscape and applying best practices to your work.

Supporting design consistency and quality across multiple digital channels, device platforms and screen resolutions.

Fuel your passion


Bachelor’s Degree in Interaction, Graphic, Industrial Design, Information Systems or “STEM” (Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics).

A minimum of 4 years of professional experience in design related roles.

An updated online portfolio that demonstrates novel solutions to solve complex problems and solid visual design skills.

Experience in applying user-centered design principles across desktop, mobile, and web platforms

Proficiency in standard design tools (Adobe CC, Figma, Axure), hand drawing and visual communication.

Ability to advocate for user needs throughout the development life cycle in an agile environment.

An understanding of capabilities and limitations of front-end technologies, including CSS, HTML, and JavaScript (you will not be expected to code).

Advanced analytics experience and its expression in the user experience.

Proven track record of owning or playing a major role in the design of applications and websites.


Design System / Material Design experience

Must have excellent teamwork, communication, and technical problem-solving skills to contribute within a multi-functional and multi-disciplined team.

Experience using Figma strongly preferred

Driven, self-motivated and results-oriented.

Strong oral and written communication skills with demonstrated ability to effectively communicate with all levels of staff including senior management team

Work in a way that works for you

We recognize that everyone is different and that the way in which people want to work and deliver at their best is different for everyone too. In this role, we can offer the following flexible working patterns:

Working flexible hours - flexing the times you work in the day (aligned across Central U.S. time zone)

Remote work options to support your work/life balance

Working with us

Our people are at the heart of what we do at Baker Hughes. We know we are better when all of our people are developed, engaged and able to bring their whole authentic selves to work. We invest in the health and well-being of our workforce, train and reward talent and develop leaders at all levels to bring out the best in each other.

Working for you

Our inventions have revolutionized energy for over a century. But to keep going forward tomorrow, we know we have to push the boundaries today. We prioritize rewarding those who embrace change with a package that reflects how much we value their input. Join us, and you can expect:

Contemporary work-life balance policies and wellbeing activities

Comprehensive private medical care options

Safety net of life insurance and disability programs

Tailored financial programs

Additional elected or voluntary benefits

Must have excellent teamwork, communication, and technical problem-solving skills to contribute within a multi-functional and multi-disciplined team.

Experience using Figma strongly preferred

Driven, self-motivated and results-oriented.

Strong oral and written communication skills with demonstrated ability to effectively communicate with all levels of staff including senior management team

Work in a way that works for you

We recognize that everyone is different and that the way in which people want to work and deliver at their best is different for everyone too. In this role, we can offer the following flexible working patterns:

Working flexible hours - flexing the times you work in the day (aligned across Central U.S. time zone)

Remote work options to support your work/life balance

Working with us

Our people are at the heart of what we do at Baker Hughes. We know we are better when all of our people are developed, engaged and able to bring their whole authentic selves to work. We invest in the health and well-being of our workforce, train and reward talent and develop leaders at all levels to bring out the best in each other.

Working for you

Our inventions have revolutionized energy for over a century. But to keep going forward tomorrow, we know we have to push the boundaries today. We prioritize rewarding those who embrace change with a package that reflects how much we value their input. Join us, and you can expect:

Contemporary work-life balance policies and wellbeing activities

Comprehensive private medical care options

Safety net of life insurance and disability programs

Tailored financial programs

Additional elected or voluntary benefits

Waygate Technologies seeks an Electrical Engineer for the R&D Engineering Team.
